title: AHA THE BOARDS HAVE BEEN BOARED!
body:
{{champion:41}} "Wait a minute, what kind of blasted sea vessel is this?"
{{champion:412}} "If you give me your soul, I'll tell you."
{{champion:41}} "No."
{{champion:412}} "Please?"
{{champion:41}}  "The sea water must be effecting your hearin' cause I said NO."
{{champion:412}} "Pretty please with Lucian's wife on top?"
{{champion:236}} "THRESSSSSSSSSSSH!"
{{champion:41}} "What are you doing on my ship?"
{{champion:236}} "Stowing away for reas...re-" *pukes*
{{champion:41}} Don't tell me you wanted to get close to the dreaded Black Mist?"
{{champion:412}} "The what?"
{{champion:236}} *gurgles affirmatively*  
{{champion:41}} "Don't tell me you don't know about it, I've lost countless friends and booty to you' reaping black waves of death."
{{champion:412}} "You mean the recruitment drive?"
{{champion:41}} "You ghosts go and kill people and yeh call it recruitment?"
{{champion:412}}  "Stop looking at it that way, they get loads of freedom. Well, most of them."
{{champion:236}} *Pukes*
*POP*
{{champion:9}} "Something is coming! Something that will change the shape of posting forever!"
{{champion:41}} "WHY ARE YOU EVEN HERE?"
{{champion:9}}  "No brains."
{{champion:41}} "K."

replies.body: 3/10 would like to see more character development and Kappas.
